title: Definitions
context: ยง275-7 Definitions. &ldquo;Emergency&rdquo; as used in sections 275-5 and 275-6 means a situation in which property or human life is in jeopardy and the prompt summoning of aid is essential. &ldquo;Party line&rdquo; as used in sections 275-5 and 275-6 means a subscriber&rsquo;s line telephone circuit, consisting of two or more main telephone stations connected therewith, each station with a distinctive ring or telephone number. [L 1957, c 190, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง309A-3; HRS ยง275-7] Note Section 275-5 referred to in text is repealed. Revision Note Definitions rearranged.
